sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"平的，平坦的"之意。
means: even ： 通常指平面上的各点或一条直线的各点处在同一平面或直线上。
flat ： 指光滑平整的表面，但不一定是水平的。
level ： 强调没有高低之处，且在同一水平面，可引申指才能相等或与相邻某物平行。
smooth ： 侧重指表面十分平滑，无任何粗糙的感觉。引申作圆滑解。

sentence.Network_en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentence.Network_cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentence.Network_en: He once told an interviewer that he didn't even like rock music.
sentence.Network_cn: 他曾告诉一位采访者，他甚至都不喜欢摇滚乐。

sentence.Network_en: Some girls may first ovulate even before they menstruate.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些女孩的第一次排卵甚至可能出现在初潮之前。

月见草（Evening primrose）——一种北美传统药草，几个世纪以来北美原住民都使用它。月见草油富含ν亚麻酸，这是一种必需的不 …
生活常用英语单词_百度文库 ... tailcoat,morning coat 大礼服 evening dress 夜礼服 dress coat,tails 燕尾服,礼服.

jx.jx_en_mean: at the very same time as

lj.lj_ly: even as he spoke their baggage was being unloaded.
lj.lj_ls: 就在他说话的时候，他们的行李被卸了下来。

lj.lj_ly: the fact is suckers never get an even break.
lj.lj_ls: 事实是涉世未深的人从来得不到公平的机会。

jx.jx_en_mean: despite the possibility that; no matter whether

lj.lj_ly: always try everything even if it turns out to be a dud.
lj.lj_ls: 任何东西都试一试，即使最终一无所用。

lj.lj_ly: he is a great President, even if he has many enemies.
lj.lj_ls: 尽管他树敌众多，他仍不失是一位伟大的总统。

jx.jx_en_mean: now (or then) as well as before

lj.lj_ly: even now, after all these years, it upsets me.
lj.lj_ls: 过了这么多年，甚至到现在，这件事还使我不安。

jx.jx_en_mean: in spite of what has (or had) happened
jx.jx_cn_mean: 尽管这样；虽然情况如此

lj.lj_ly: even then he never raised his voice to me.
lj.lj_ls: 尽管如此，他从没对我发过火。

lj.lj_ly: very likely you are even now picking up the telephone to ring.
lj.lj_ls: 很可能此刻你正拿起电话打电话。

lj.lj_ly: not the most exciting of places, but even so I was having a good time.
lj.lj_ls: 虽不是最令人兴奋的地方，但即便如此，我还是玩得很开心。

lj.lj_ly: even though he was bigger, he never looked down on me.
lj.lj_ls: 虽然他块头比我大，但是他从没瞧不起我。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)inflict similar trouble or harm on someone to that which they have inflicted on oneself
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)摆平；扯平；进行报复；算账

lj.lj_ly: I'll get &B{even with} you for this.
lj.lj_ls: 这件事我会找你算账的。

jx.jx_en_mean: In a stable or unimpaired state
jx.jx_cn_mean: 坚定地：处于平稳的或不动摇的状态

lj.lj_ly: “There was good reason to keep relations with Washington on an even keel”(&b{Helen Kitchen})
lj.lj_ls: “与华盛顿保持平稳关系是很理智的”(&b{海伦·基钦})

means.word_mean: 平坦的;齐的;均匀的;偶数

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English efen (adjective), efne (adverb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch even, effen and German eben
Old English ǣfen, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch avont and German Abend

entry.def: You use even to suggest that what comes just after or just before it in the sentence is rather surprising.

example.ex: He kept calling me for years, even after he got married...
example.tran: 多年来他一直打电话给我，甚至是在他结婚以后。

example.ex: Even dark-skinned women should use sunscreens...
example.tran: 即使黑皮肤的女性也应该涂抹防晒霜。

entry.tran: （与形容词、副词的比较级连用）更加，愈发
entry.def: You use even with comparative adjectives and adverbs to emphasize a quality that someone or something has.

example.ex: It was on television that he made an even stronger impact as an interviewer...
example.tran: 作为采访者，是电视让他产生了更大的影响。

example.ex: During his second day Edward looked even more pale and quiet than on his first...
example.tran: 第二天，爱德华看起来比前一天更加苍白，也更加安静了。

entry.def: You use even if or even though to indicate that a particular fact does not make the rest of your statement untrue.

example.ex: Cynthia is not ashamed of what she does, even if she ends up doing something wrong...
example.tran: 辛西娅不为自己的所作所为感到羞愧，即使最终证明她所做的是错误的。

example.ex: Even though I'm supposed to be working by myself, there are other people who I can interact with.
example.tran: 即便是需要我一个人工作，我还是可以和别人进行交流的。

entry.def: If one thing happens even as something else happens, they both happen at exactly the same time.

example.ex: Even as she said this, she knew it was not quite true...
example.tran: 就在她说这个的时候，她知道自己说的并非全是真的。

example.ex: He had been aware, even as he slept, of the noise of the engine.
example.tran: 即使在睡觉的时候，他也一直听得到发动机的噪音。

entry.def: You use even so to introduce a surprising fact which relates to what you have just said.

example.ex: The bus was only half full. Even so, a young man asked Nina if the seat next to her was taken...
example.tran: 公共汽车上只坐满了一半。尽管如此，一个年轻男子还是问尼娜她旁边的座位有没有人坐。

example.ex: She has never given up her nationality. Even so, her opponents argue that she is not a true Burmese.
example.tran: 她从未放弃过她的国籍。即便如此，反对者仍然说她不是真正的缅甸人。

entry.def: You use even then to say that something is the case in spite of what has just been stated or whatever the circumstances may be.

example.ex: Peace could come only gradually, in carefully measured steps. Even then, it sounds almost impossible to achieve...
example.tran: 和平只会逐渐到来，而且每一步都走得小心翼翼。即使那样，要实现和平听起来仍几乎不可能。

example.ex: She was at her prettiest in her late teens, but even then she always had somebody who was prettier.
example.tran: 她在十八九岁的时候最漂亮，但是即使在那时，也总有人比她更漂亮。

entry.def: An even measurement or rate stays at about the same level.

example.ex: How important is it to have an even temperature when you're working?...
example.tran: 工作时周围环境温度恒定有多么重要呢？

example.ex: The brick-built property keeps the temperature at an even level throughout the year.
example.tran: 那栋砖砌的房子里全年温度恒定。

entry.def: An even surface is smooth and flat.

example.ex: The tables are fitted with a glass top to provide an even surface.
example.tran: 桌子装了玻璃表面，因此十分平滑。

entry.def: If there is an even distribution or division of something, each person, group, or area involved has an equal amount.

example.ex: Divide the dough into 12 even pieces and shape each piece into a ball...
example.tran: 将面团分成12等份，每份揉成球状。

example.ex: Many are tired of being unpopular because of their wealth and would encourage more even distribution of it.
example.tran: 很多人厌倦了因为自己的财富而不受欢迎，从而会鼓励更加均匀地分配财富。

entry.tran: （比赛、竞争等）平衡的，不相上下的，势均力敌的
entry.def: An even contest or competition is equally balanced between the two sides who are taking part.

example.ex: It was an even game.
example.tran: 这是一场势均力敌的比赛。

example.ex: ...an even match between eight nations.
example.tran: 8个国家间一场不相上下的竞赛

entry.def: If you are even with someone, you do not owe them anything, such as money or a favour.

example.ex: You don't owe me. I don't owe you. We're even.
example.tran: 你不欠我，我也不欠你，我们扯平了。

entry.def: If your voice is even, you are speaking in a very controlled way which makes it difficult for people to tell what your feelings are.

example.ex: My voice surprised me; it was even and emotionless.
example.tran: 我的声音听起来心平气和、不露一丝感情，这让我自己颇感惊讶。

entry.def: An even number can be divided exactly by the number two.

entry.tran: （成败机会）各半的，对半的，相等的
entry.def: If there is an even chance that something will happen, it is no more likely that it will happen than it will not happen.

example.ex: They have a more than even chance of winning the next election...
example.tran: 他们赢得下届选举的机会在五成以上。

entry.def: When a company or a persn running a business breaks even, they make neither a profit nor a loss.

example.ex: The airline hopes to break even next year and return to profit the following year...
example.tran: 那家航空公司希望明年实现收支相抵，在随后一年重新盈利。

example.ex: The theatre needs to fill over ninety per cent of its seats every night just to break even.
example.tran: 那家剧院每天晚上需要有90%以上的上座率才刚刚能够收支相抵。

entry.def: If you say that you are going to get even with someone, you mean that you are going to cause them the same amount of harm or annoyance as they have caused you.

example.ex: I'm going to get even with you for this...
example.tran: 我会跟你算这笔账的。

example.ex: Don't get angry, get even.
example.tran: 与其生闷气，不如出口气。

means.word_mean: 2. equal in degree or extent or amount; or equally matched or balanced;
3. being level or straight or regular and without variation as e.g. in shape or texture; or being in the same plane or at the same height as something else (i.e. even with);

sentences.sentence: "the picture is even with the window"

means.word_mean: 6. of the score in a contest;
1. used as an intensive especially to indicate something unexpected;

sentences.sentence: "even when he is sick, he works"
"even with his head start she caught up with him"

means.word_mean: 3. to a greater degree or extent; used with comparisons;

auth_sentence.content: Even in old age, Walter was pretty scary.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even in old age, Walter was pretty scary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even in old age, Walter was pretty scary.

auth_sentence.content: To be even safer, ostriches spread the risks.
auth_sentence.res_content: To be even safer, ostriches spread the risks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To be even safer, ostriches spread the risks.

auth_sentence.content: Now it's seen as glamorous, even sophisticated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now it's seen as glamorous, even sophisticated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now it's seen as glamorous, even sophisticated.

sentences.en: He never even bothered to acknowledge her presence.
sentences.cn: 他甚至对她的在场未予理会。

sentences.en: Even a child can answer it.
sentences.cn: 甚至连小孩都能回答这个问题。

sentences.en: You seem even more beautiful than usual today.
sentences.cn: 你今天好像比平时更漂亮。

sentences.en: It was cold yesterday, but it's even colder today.
sentences.cn: 昨天冷, 今天更冷了。

sentences.en: In the end we arrived at the even ground at the top of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 最后我们登上了山顶上的平地。

sentences.en: The country is even with no high hills.
He cut the bushes even with the fence.
sentences.cn: 他把灌木丛剪得和围栏一样高。

means.word_mean: 均匀的; 有规律的; 稳定的

sentences.en: He cut the bread into even slices.
sentences.cn: 他把面包均匀地切成片。

sentences.en: The child's pulse is now even.
sentences.cn: 孩子的脉搏现在稳定了。

sentences.en: He tried to keep his voice even.
sentences.cn: 他尽力使自己的声音保持平静。

sentences.en: The two horses were even in the race.
sentences.cn: 那两匹马竞赛的成绩相等。

sentences.en: Thirteen is not divisible by any even number.
The carpenter evened a board with a plane.
sentences.cn: 那位木工用刨子刨平了一块木板。

sentences.en: She evened the edges by trimming them.

sentences.cn: 史密斯进的球把比分拉平了。

jushi.english: The farmers grew too little to feed even their own families.
jushi.chinese: 这些农民们种植得太少,连他们自家吃的还不够。

jushi.english: Ade never fetches out his best dishes even when guests arrive.
jushi.chinese: 即便来了客人,艾德也不把他最好的盘碟摆出来。

jushi.english: I can't even remember the name of that old friend of mine.
jushi.chinese: 我甚至连那位老朋友的名字都一点不记得了。
